scripts.updateServiceOne: cd productDetails && git checkout && git pull
scripts.updateServiceTwo: cd QnA && git checkout && git pull
scripts.updateServiceThree: cd related-products && git checkout && git pull
scripts.updateServiceFour: cd reviewsService && git checkout && git pull
scripts.updateAll: npm run updateServiceOne && npm run updateServiceTwo && npm run updateServiceThree && npm run updateServiceFour
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "nodemon" "cd productDetails && npm start" "cd QnA && npm start" "cd related-products && npm start" "cd reviewsService && npm start"
